results.title: Metformin attenuates progression of carotid arterial wall thickness in patients with type 2 diabetes.
results.text_hl: Changes in CCA-IMT were compared with control @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@. After 2-year @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy, the progression of @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_contractural_arachnodactyly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536211 @@@CCA-@@@IMT was significantly less than 56 control @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (0.02+/-0.08 mm versus 0.07+/-0.08 mm, P<0.01).

citations.NLM: Matsumoto K, Sera Y, Abe Y, Tominaga T, Yeki Y, Miyake S. Metformin attenuates progression of carotid arterial wall thickness in patients with type 2 diabetes. Diabetes Res Clin Pract. 2004 Jun;64(3):225-8. PMID: 15126012
